acceptedAnswer.text: Opulus enables music-backed asset trading by combining decentralized finance (DeFi) and NFTs, providing a platform for artists and investors to create and profit from music royalties.

mainEntity.name: How do I set up a digital wallet for Opulus NFTs?

acceptedAnswer.text: Choose a digital wallet like MetaMask or Trust Wallet, ensuring it is compatible with the Ethereum blockchain.

mainEntity.name: Where can I buy cryptocurrency to purchase Opulus NFTs?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can purchase Ethereum through cryptocurrency exchanges like Coinbase, Binance, or Kraken.

mainEntity.name: How do I research NFT projects on Opulus?

acceptedAnswer.text: Explore the Opulus Marketplace to discover various music-related NFT investment opportunities.

mainEntity.name: What are the steps to purchase Opulus NFTs?

acceptedAnswer.text: To purchase Opulus NFTs, connect your digital wallet to the marketplace and initiate your purchase.

mainEntity.name: How can I verify my Opulus NFT ownership?

acceptedAnswer.text: Use Etherscan to confirm and view the details of your NFT transaction.
